General.Name: Merkur PrivatBank KgaA
General.Description: Merkur PrivatBank KgaA provides various private banking products and services in Germany. The company offers business and private accounts; fixed deposits; securities accounts; wealth management; master cards; and SME, real estate, and developer financing, and lease refinancing services. It also offers online and mobile banking services. Merkur PrivatBank KgaA was founded in 1923 and is based in Munich, Germany.

1.Name: Dr. Andreas E. H. Maurer
